name: Forevermore (Sweetvin3)
description:
Forevermore is a short, pixel-art game, where you help Nozomi to make decisions, but be aware that the decisions you choose for her may be okey for you, but not for her very sensitive and fragile soul.

By the way it is my very first game so please be nice ^^

It has real and fiction happenings in the game.

✩ 3 endings

✩ 15-30 minutes of gameplay

Software: RPG Maker MV.                 


Name: Nozomi Hara
Age: 22
Job: Artist
Sign of the zodiac: Cancer



Name : Aoi  Anzai
Age : 26
Job: Fulltime student
Sign of the zodiac: Virgo

The game is playable in about 20 minutes and contains multiple endings depending on your choices so be careful.


To deal with someone who is always on a emotional rollercoaster, must be quite hard for Aoi. It's like Nozomi changes into another person sometimes.

Note:
The character design and the background music (not the "game over" soundtrack) are original and are belonging to the creator of the game ^^ - Sweetvin3.
Fanworks are very appreciated (i'd love to see them!), but please do not RP any of the characters or make any RP groups based-off Forevermore. thank you! <3
Any suggestions and critic is welcome, i hope i will be able to do better next time!
I wish you will enjoy the game... that's all i want. 😌

I will add a download for android very soon (having trouble, it's not working) but it will soon :D
